scripts.build: yarn build-boot && yarn psyts build && yarn build:package-json
scripts.build-boot: echo "bootstrapping psychic cli..." && rm -rf dist && rm -rf ./spec && rm -rf ./test-app && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.boot.json && yarn build:package-json
scripts.build-core: rm -rf dist && APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd)/test-app  NODE_ENV=development yarn --cwd=node_modules/dream build && echo "building psychic core..." && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.build-core.json && yarn after-build-core
scripts.sync: NODE_ENV=development yarn --cwd=node_modules/dream build-boot && NODE_ENV=development yarn dream sync:existing && NODE_ENV=development yarn --cwd=node_modules/dream build
scripts.syncb: NODE_ENV=development yarn --cwd=node_modules/dream build-boot && NODE_ENV=development yarn dream sync:existing && NODE_ENV=development yarn dream sync:config-cache && yarn --cwd=node_modules/dream build && yarn build
scripts.uspec: APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd)/test-app yarn psyts sync:all --core && APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd)/test-app PSYCHIC_CORE_DEVELOPMENT=1 TS_SAFE=1 jest --config=./spec/unit/jest.config.js --runInBand --forceExit
scripts.fspec: APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd)/test-app yarn psyts sync:all --core && APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd)/test-app PSYCHIC_CORE_DEVELOPMENT=1 TS_SAFE=1 jest --config=./spec/features/jest.config.js --runInBand --forceExit
scripts.postinstall: if [ ! -e .no-psychic-postinstall ]; then yarn psyts sync:routes && yarn build; fi
